website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate beach cruiser for your girly-girl.
pros: White-wall balloon tires for a cushioned ride
Oversize seat with dual springs for added comfort
cons: Rear axle is a little short for training wheels, but they can be added with modifications

customer_reviews.title: Adorable white cruiser
customer_reviews.text: What an ADORABLE bicycle. My daughter loves it. (She is 7 yrs old & 50" tall---this bike is the right size) Contacted customer service due to enamel paint in the threads that prevented proper assembly of the bike---they remedied it promptly! This company REALLY CARES!
customer_reviews.author: Gardening & Painting Fool

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware and Stained Seat
customer_reviews.text: There was not a way for us to contact the company directly, so we decided to write this in hopes of getting some attention to this issue. We love the color of the bike and it looks great and our granddaughter loves it. HOWEVER, we are missing some hardware (screws, nuts and washers) to both fenders and the white seat has a stain on it (not just dirt, we did try to wipe it off). But an actual stain. Could we please get these pieces replaced? Thank you for your attention!
customer_reviews.author: Klo Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a Christmas present for our daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for our daughter. The bike assembly was missing the nut to secure the handlebars to the frame of the bike. I was frustrated after calling the company many times only to wait on hold with no one ever answering. She loves the bike but I ultimately took it into a local bike shop, they special ordered a similar part and fixed it. The seat is also a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.author: B. Luce

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in
customer_reviews.text: got this for her in 2017. she has since outgrown this little cruiser, but being 2 years old it has held up fantastically well. the seat still has good bounce, the tires never lost shape, the rims are still true. no chips or wear on the bike anywhere. all in all, for 2 years of riding on occasion it was worth the $179 I paid (amazon's price, then). it is time to re-home this sporty little cruiser. but we sure will miss her. i would recommend this. perfect for a child around 6-10 yrs. (get a basket, if you wanna be LEGIT!)
customer_reviews.author: M. Stivers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike!
customer_reviews.text: We love the bike! It's well made and great looking. Comfortable to ride. Ordering process was very easy and shipping was surprisingly quick. The only issue was lack of instruction. It is obvious where different parts go since the assembly was only required for front tire, fenders, handlebars, pedals and seat. Pay attention that the handlebars are turned around, probably the only info we found that was extremely important to getting things in place. Make sure you have Allen Wrenches too. Would have given 5 stars all the way through except for the instructions. We did figure it all out in the end and absolutely love the bike.
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaS

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest bikes I've seen and my 6 year old loves it too. The big problem is that it's incredibly heavy so she's having a difficult time holding it steady while she gets on or walking it across streets. I imagine for her it feels the same as it would for adult holding up a motorcycle. Id return it if I hadn't already recycled the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: pisces girl

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bike. I bought this bike knowing there were a few scratches; however, after attempting to put it together I noticed many pieces missing. I had to go to a local fastener store to buy extra nuts and bolts. There is still a missing piece that goes on the fender that I’m not sure how to fix. Nothing is more frustrating then realizing that a gift you’re giving is being rigged to work.
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to build but pretty bike.
customer_reviews.text: Challenging to build but after the stress of build was over we were happy to have purchased the bike. I would only purchase again if for this price it came built already. The price does not match the challenge to build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike but arrived dirty.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this bike. It's super cute and we put it together fairly easily. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because some of the peices came dirty. Not just wipe off with a wet towel dirty. It had sticky stuff on it that was really difficult to get off. For such a nice bike I would have expected the peices to come looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Lsp 79

customer_reviews.title: Equability is OK, what one would expect for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Equability is OK, what one would expect for the price. Rims are Purple, nothing close to Pink and the "matching accessories" that are pink do not match what so ever.......OK if your color blind......
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL J GELSKEY

customer_reviews.title: Firmstrong for the win!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is fantastic. Worth every dollar. My daughter LOVES riding it and cruising around the blocks. Rides Very comfortable and smooth. Now I need to get myself one and join her. This bike is made to last. Not cheaply made or pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kps

customer_reviews.title: The best bicycle!
customer_reviews.text: This bicycle is perfect for our 9 year old. It was backordered but pleasantly arrived early. I am very impressed with the packing of the bicycle. Approximately half of the bicycle is akready assembled. Every inch of the bicycle was protected. All of the hardware was present amd once assembled appears to be of the highest quality. Even the tires arrived inflated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect girls pink cruiser
customer_reviews.text: An excellent sturdy bicycle, perfectly suited to our 7 year old daughter. Despite not having a front brake (available if required separately), my daughter took to tis gem of a bike with ease. She loves it. Mechanically very good and a good size to allow some growth. Overall, very happy with this purchase and aftersales (for the front brake) was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: The Kernel

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer! Just Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike. Paint and quality is amazing. I usually stick with the $100 bikes from big box stores, I have to say you get what you pay for here. 7 year old daughter loves it. Well made and sturdy. I can’t think of ever buying anything that was as well packaged as this bike was. Not a single scratch on it... yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Danielski

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cruiser for PreTeens
customer_reviews.text: Fun in the Sun. Fantastic color, comfy seat, and easy to ride and pick up for my petite ten year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sun  & Sand

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price All Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, assembled last night and pleased with packaging, build and quality. Time will tell but so far am pleased with what I have seen so far and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for a fair price! Easy to assemble and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike
customer_reviews.text: What a cute bike! Great quality and perfect for my 8 year old little girl. Easy to ride!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: BeachBikes Best Buying Experience - Firmstrong Win
customer_reviews.text: The bike is a great product. It was a little tricky getting it put together, but it's a high quality product. The seller was the best part of this purchase. They went the extra mile and I'm already planning to buy another. I highly suggest if you're considering it, to use BeachBikes. The process with them has been unlike any other and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CoupDeTa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I had my 8 year old help me, and she also enjoyed the easy assembly. She loves the bike, we put a basket on the front to make it official beach cruiser. She really enjoys the ride and said its so much easier than her other bike. Easy ride and looks great. It fits her well. The parts are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on fender
customer_reviews.text: There was a scratch on the fender. I thought I was buying a womans bike, however, this was a girls bike and I am returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Creed

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bike. My grand daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bike. My grand daughter loves it. I would have given the bike 5 stars but there is no bell and the rear red safety reflector mounts under the seat where it can't be seen, it should be on the rear fender.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Solid bike !!
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrive promptly on time! The color pink was very cute with the white wall tires! My 8 year old niece loved it for her birthday gift! The bike feels solid and durable for what a kid will put through it! Seems like this could become a hand-me-down to cousins when she grows out of it, overall very pleased and impressed with the quality of the bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old daughter loves the bike! She didn't like the seat at first, but after a few adjustments and settling in, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter N

customer_reviews.title: A great solid bike
customer_reviews.text: A great solid bike. Not too heavy for a petite seven year old. I highly recommend this bike. Fast shipping and easy to assemble. Would buy again but I think this bike will be around for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: great bike
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my daughters birthday. its a beautiful bike. easy to put together. she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DEAN WELLS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bike, and smooth ride. My 8 yo daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: received the wrong color !! too much haste to return/exchange
customer_reviews.text: the bike is great .. except we order a pink one and received a purple one .. (purple was not an option when we purchase) .. too much hassle to return .. so we are stuck with a color that we not necessarily loved! 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing gooseneck
customer_reviews.text: Hello- I received the bike yesterday and began to assemble and notice me the gooseneck price was not in the box. Is this something that can be sent separately or do I need to send the entire bike back?
customer_reviews.author: John Lawall

customer_reviews.title: Just a few small things would have been nice
customer_reviews.text: Like assembly instructions and maybe a little bottle of paint to cover up the small chipped finish areas.
customer_reviews.author: washi

customer_reviews.title: The bike is a perfect fit for 6 yr old
customer_reviews.text: The bike is a perfect fit for 6 yr old, but is missing 2screws to attach rear fender to it's supports on either side of tire. Called Amazon and they couldn't help. I guess I have to go to bike shop. Otherwise beautiful forgot to mention Amazon did give me a credit because of missing screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the classiest bike on the block! Easy to assemble, AMAZING customer service. Really great company to purchase from and very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E Greco

customer_reviews.title: Missing front metal pieces that secure the front wheel protector ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing front metal pieces that secure the front wheel protector to the bike so it hits the frame everytime the handles are turned......
customer_reviews.author: Candi Christenson

customer_reviews.title: was disappointed with that
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 3 days late, was disappointed with that, however the bike itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality bike. Heavy but in a good, well built, kind of way.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeGuy

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter, she loves it, wasn't easy to assemble but all in all it is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Phillips

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice bike. I ordered this for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bike. I ordered this for my granddaughter. She is enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to assemble. A little pricey but we will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: jbbrn

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter's First " Big Bike"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grand daughter's 7th birthday. Very well made bike. Easy to assemble. Fast shipping. Excellent people to work with for the sale. It will be handed down to her little sister.
customer_reviews.author: Miatadriver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bicycle for my granddaughter’s birthday. She loves it - I’m thinking of buying one for me so we can ride together. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Teiohontsia Skidders

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent looking bike. Bolt that holds the reflector is too big. Instructions are sub-par.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bicycle
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bicycle for my daughter's 8th birthday. We could not be happier with the purchase. The description is extremely accurate and the color is beautiful! It is very sturdy and well made. My daughter absolutely loves her new bike!!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the bike. It was easy to assemble and looks great. We are very happy with the purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach cruiser....
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for my 9 year old daughter for at the beach.....She loves it and it looks like the old beach bikes
customer_reviews.author: Todd Darr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bikes, girls rims are Purple, not Pink
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves Firmstrong beach cruisers. We have 5 in total. Bikes ride smooth and are easy to pedal. Giving 4 out of 5 because the rims are purple, not pink. Good for you to know in the event you are ordering for a young girl that loves and is expecting pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bike!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter absolutely loves this bike! We are so pleased with it. It's a great quality and simply beautiful. And the costumer service is beyond outstanding. We ordered a blue bike a week before Christmas. The day after it was purchased I was notified that the blue was it of stock but they could change the color and give us a discount. The bike arrived before expected and was loved even thought it wasn't the color she was expecting. Would recommend this bike to anyone in search of a beach cruiser for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bike. Easy to put together. Daughter has never mastered riding a bike but with this bike took her a week and she has mastered riding. She loves her bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: bike was way to small like for a young child and was intended for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I was expecting, bike was way to small like for a young child and was intended for my girlfriend, just ended up giving it away
customer_reviews.author: Seth L. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bike - sturdy and well made. We bought for 8 year old grand daughter for Christmas and it is a great size for her. We added a wicker basket, because this is the kind of girl she is. She is more of a girly girl and not athletic, which is why we chose this bike. It fits her personality perfectly. She quickly learned to ride without training wheels.
customer_reviews.author: inkneedeep

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this bike and she gets so many compliments on it. It is easy to put together. I bought a white basket for the front - she loves riding around.
customer_reviews.author: VH

product_meta.title: Firmstrong Urban Girl Single Speed Beach Cruiser Bicycle
product_meta.description: A great introduction to riding in style, the 20-inch single-speed Urban Girl cruiser bike from Firmstrong is ideal for both children just learning to ride as well as those who have graduated from training wheels. It features 20-inch wheels as well as front and rear fenders. The coaster brake stops by pedaling backwards, which is an easy and safe way for children to learn to ride. Sized for young riders from 3 feet, 2-inches to 4 feet, 4-inches tall, it's a great choice for many riding environments -- by the beach or anywhere else on a paved path. The Urban Girl is designed just like Firmstrong' s bikes for older riders with a classic, curvy cruiser design and a durable 13-inch steel frame. The 20-inch aluminum wheels feature 2.125-inch wide white-wall balloon tires that roll smooth and easy as well as cushion the bumps as you ride over them freely. The wide, oversized cruiser seat completes your comfort with dual springs that help make the ride soft and cushy. Both the seat and the handlebars can be adjusted for height and tilt to properly fit the rider. It also features a chain guard to protect pant cuffs from getting caught in the chain and wide cruiser bike handlebars with rubber grips. The bike is shipped 80 percent assembled. Firmstrong has been designing high quality, affordable bikes for over 10 years with a focus on blending style and functionality to create a fun, adventurous experience for riders -- not just a mode of transportation.
feature_bullets: 20-inch girl's single-speed cruiser bike great for introduction to relaxed riding
Pedal-backwards coaster brake for easy pedaling and smooth braking
White-wall balloon tires for a cushioned ride; front and rear fenders
Oversized seat with dual springs for added comfort
13-inch frame sized for young riders from 3 feet, 2 inches to 4 feet, 4 inches tall
